     9â†’import React, { createContext, useContext, useReducer, useCallback, ReactNode } from 'react'
    10â†’import type {
    11â†’  OnboardingStep,
    12â†’  OnboardingState,
    13â†’  BirthInfo,
    14â†’  ConcernType,
    15â†’  PersonaType,
    16â†’  BaziData,

    18â†’} from './types'
    19â†’
    20â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    21â†’// State & Actions
    22â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    23â†’
    24â†’const initialState: OnboardingState = {
    25â†’  step: 'landing',
    26â†’  birthInfo: null,
    27â†’  concerns: [],
    28â†’  gender: null,
    29â†’  persona: null,
    30â†’  baziData: null,
    31â†’  interviewAnswers: [],
    32â†’  letterContent: null,
    33â†’}
    34â†’
    35â†’type Action =
    36â†’  | { type: 'SET_STEP'; payload: OnboardingStep }
    37â†’  | { type: 'SET_BIRTH_INFO'; payload: BirthInfo }
    38â†’  | { type: 'SET_CONCERNS'; payload: ConcernType[] }
    39â†’  | { type: 'SET_GENDER'; payload: string }
    40â†’  | { type: 'SET_PERSONA'; payload: PersonaType }
    41â†’  | { type: 'SET_BAZI_DATA'; payload: BaziData }
    42â†’  | { type: 'ADD_INTERVIEW_ANSWER'; payload: InterviewAnswer }
    43â†’  | { type: 'SET_LETTER_CONTENT'; payload: string }
    44â†’  | { type: 'RESET' }
    45â†’
    46â†’function reducer(state: OnboardingState, action: Action): OnboardingState {
    47â†’  switch (action.type) {
    48â†’    case 'SET_STEP':
    49â†’      return { ...state, step: action.payload }
    50â†’    case 'SET_BIRTH_INFO':
    51â†’      return { ...state, birthInfo: action.payload }
    52â†’    case 'SET_CONCERNS':
    53â†’      return { ...state, concerns: action.payload }
    54â†’    case 'SET_GENDER':
    55â†’      return { ...state, gender: action.payload }
    56â†’    case 'SET_PERSONA':
    57â†’      return { ...state, persona: action.payload }
    58â†’    case 'SET_BAZI_DATA':
    59â†’      return { ...state, baziData: action.payload }
    60â†’    case 'ADD_INTERVIEW_ANSWER':
    61â†’      return {
    62â†’        ...state,
    63â†’        interviewAnswers: [...state.interviewAnswers, action.payload],
    64â†’      }
    65â†’    case 'SET_LETTER_CONTENT':
    66â†’      return { ...state, letterContent: action.payload }
    67â†’    case 'RESET':
    68â†’      return initialState
    69â†’    default:
    70â†’      return state
    71â†’  }
    72â†’}
    73â†’
    74â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    75â†’// Context
    76â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
    77â†’
    78â†’interface OnboardingContextValue {
    79â†’  state: OnboardingState
    80â†’  // Navigation
    81â†’  goToStep: (step: OnboardingStep) => void
    82â†’  nextStep: () => void
    83â†’  // Data setters
    84â†’  setBirthInfo: (info: BirthInfo) => void
    85â†’  setConcerns: (concerns: ConcernType[]) => void
    86â†’  setGender: (gender: string) => void
    87â†’  setPersona: (persona: PersonaType) => void
    88â†’  setBaziData: (data: BaziData) => void
    89â†’  addInterviewAnswer: (answer: InterviewAnswer) => void
    90â†’  setLetterContent: (content: string) => void
    91â†’  // Utils
    92â†’  reset: () => void
    93â†’}
    94â†’
    95â†’const OnboardingContext = createContext<OnboardingContextValue | null>(null)
    96â†’
    97â†’// Step order for nextStep navigation (v4.0: 90ç§’æ—…ç¨‹)
    98â†’// Phase 1: ç›¸é‡ (landing) -> Phase 2: æ´å¯Ÿ (loading) -> Phase 3: å…±é¸£ (aha) -> Phase 4: æœŸå¾… (conversion)
    99â†’const STEP_ORDER: OnboardingStep[] = [
   100â†’  'landing',    // 0-15ç§’: è¾“å…¥ç”Ÿæ—¥
   101â†’  'loading',    // 15-45ç§’: å…«å­—æ’ç›˜ + æ˜Ÿåº§åˆ†æ
   102â†’  'aha',        // 45-75ç§’: æ ¸å¿ƒæ´å¯Ÿ + Identity Prism é¢„è§ˆ
   103â†’  'conversion', // 75-90ç§’: ä»Šæ—¥è¿åŠ¿é¢„è§ˆ + ä»˜è´¹å¼•å¯¼
   104â†’]
   105â†’
   106â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   107â†’// Provider
   108â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   109â†’
   110â†’export function OnboardingProvider({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) {
   111â†’  const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState)
   112â†’
   113â†’  const goToStep = useCallback((step: OnboardingStep) => {
   114â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_STEP', payload: step })
   115â†’  }, [])
   116â†’
   117â†’  const nextStep = useCallback(() => {
   118â†’    const currentIndex = STEP_ORDER.indexOf(state.step)
   119â†’    if (currentIndex < STEP_ORDER.length - 1) {
   120â†’      dispatch({ type: 'SET_STEP', payload: STEP_ORDER[currentIndex + 1] })
   121â†’    }
   122â†’  }, [state.step])
   123â†’
   124â†’  const setBirthInfo = useCallback((info: BirthInfo) => {
   125â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_BIRTH_INFO', payload: info })
   126â†’  }, [])
   127â†’
   128â†’  const setConcerns = useCallback((concerns: ConcernType[]) => {
   129â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_CONCERNS', payload: concerns })
   130â†’  }, [])
   131â†’
   132â†’  const setGender = useCallback((gender: string) => {
   133â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_GENDER', payload: gender })
   134â†’  }, [])
   135â†’
   136â†’  const setPersona = useCallback((persona: PersonaType) => {
   137â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_PERSONA', payload: persona })
   138â†’  }, [])
   139â†’
   140â†’  const setBaziData = useCallback((data: BaziData) => {
   141â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_BAZI_DATA', payload: data })
   142â†’  }, [])
   143â†’
   144â†’  const addInterviewAnswer = useCallback((answer: InterviewAnswer) => {
   145â†’    dispatch({ type: 'ADD_INTERVIEW_ANSWER', payload: answer })
   146â†’  }, [])
   147â†’
   148â†’  const setLetterContent = useCallback((content: string) => {
   149â†’    dispatch({ type: 'SET_LETTER_CONTENT', payload: content })
   150â†’  }, [])
   151â†’
   152â†’  const reset = useCallback(() => {
   153â†’    dispatch({ type: 'RESET' })
   154â†’  }, [])
   155â†’
   156â†’  const value: OnboardingContextValue = {
   157â†’    state,
   158â†’    goToStep,
   159â†’    nextStep,
   160â†’    setBirthInfo,
   161â†’    setConcerns,
   162â†’    setGender,
   163â†’    setPersona,
   164â†’    setBaziData,
   165â†’    addInterviewAnswer,
   166â†’    setLetterContent,
   167â†’    reset,
   168â†’  }
   169â†’
   170â†’  return (
   171â†’    <OnboardingContext.Provider value={value}>
   172â†’      {children}
   173â†’    </OnboardingContext.Provider>
   174â†’  )
   175â†’}
   176â†’
   177â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   178â†’// Hook
   179â†’// â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
   180â†’
   181â†’export function useOnboarding() {
   182â†’  const context = useContext(OnboardingContext)
   183â†’  if (!context) {
   184â†’    throw new Error('useOnboarding must be used within OnboardingProvider')
   185â†’  }
   186â†’  return context
   187â†’}
